name: Magical Girl
description:
There is a Smoking Hot Babe at the Top!" is a platforming challenge about struggling upwards in search of the legendary Smoking Hot Babe! This lonely adventure to reach The Top will demand full mastery of the technique of jumping. Just try to remember, with each fall there is a lesson to be learned...

Are you a lone capy-warrior or a squad commander? Take on the adventure solo or team up with your capy-comrades through Online or Local Co-op for a fur-ocious fight!
